string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for hacking or illegal use of third-party programs.

string.name: msg
string.value:
Your account has been temporarily restricted 
for violating game policies in one 
or more of the following ways:

1. Repeatedly trading mesos and/or items 
with an account that has violated game policies.
2. Creating a party with an account that has 
violated game policies and illicitly obtained EXP.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for illegal cash transaction.

string.name: msg
string.value: [CSCSCS] You are unable to login using this ID at the moment.rnWe're currently looking into your customer support inquiry and trying to resolve the issue as soon as possible.rnPlease try logging in again in a bit.rnrnIf the same problem continues, please use Live Assistance feature on the MapleStory website.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for temporary request. Please contact customer support for further details.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for impersonating GM.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for using illegal programs or violating the game policy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your account has been blocked for one of cursing, scamming, or illegal trading via Megaphones.

string.name: msg
string.value: This ID has been blocked for proceeding with, encouraging, promoting or supporting solicitation in the game.

string.name: msg
string.value: This ID has been blocked for exploiting in-game bugs or violating game policies.
